metadata.name: Mirror
metadata.description:
Allan Hamilton called horses 'divine mirrors' . Hamilton, wisely  niticed that horses reflect back the emotions you put in. If you put in love and respect and kindness and curiosity, the horse will return that.

As a young child I was fascinated with horses.  They are truly majestic creatures. There is no telling how many make believe adventures Ibwent innwith my imaginary horse, we will call Mirror.
